name: The Lost Treasures of Infocom II
overview: Compilation of 11 Infocom games: Border Zone A Mind Forever Voyaging Plundered Hearts Bureaucracy Cutthroats Hollywood Hijinx Seastalker Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels Wishbringer Nord and Bert Couldn't Make Head or Tail of It Trinity CD-ROM Release contains 3 Extra Adventure Games created by the Staff of Infocom: Arthur: The Quest for Excalibur Journey: The Quest Begins James Clavell's Shogun
